alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 06 at 3:21AM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph expected. Isolated gusts up to 80 mph possible in the most wind-prone areas. * WHERE...Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Southern Ventura County Mountains, Northern Ventura County Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor, Western Antelope Valley Foothills, San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands and Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts over 60 mph are most likely over the mountains and foothills. Also, light to moderate snow showers have the potential to impact the Interstate-5 corridor and the northern Ventura County mountains tonight into Sunday morning. While accumulating snows are unlikely to be heavy, there is a chance for a couple inches of snow to accumulate. The snow and wind could combine to create significant visibility restrictions, along with hazardous travel. This includes portions of Interstate 5 near the Grapevine.
info.instruction: People should avoid being in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain inside and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
